text:
New e-Invoice Rules under GST from 1st June 2025

https://t.co/QcgfpSrFP0 PM.png

https://t.co/xlh8PfmB3W

You try out a few cloud services over the weekend. Just quiet usage stacking in the background without any alarms or alerts.

By Monday, you get a $50,000 invoice. It’s more common than you think; here’s why: https://t.co/66t9FxFTyB
Nothing gets you the right tax forms faster than sending the invoice with the sales tax applied.
@ad8lpa5han @Ford It's like $500 above invoice

@ray_osa @BonkDaCarnivore @dholzric @RampCapitalLLC Customers who I've fired in the past did it to themselves. Forever growing project scope with zero appetite to pay for their extras; demanding help to do unethical/illegal things; arguing over *every*single*invoice*.

That ~5% reduction in $$ saved us 10x over in fewer headaches.
